title: 349: Cold Calling People + First Impressions!
itunes:title: 349: Cold Calling People + First Impressions!
description:
(CW: Body image) The Broads are here to be tangential and open and first they dive into Bekah’s sleeping challenges with the kids, Ember’s wild middle of the night commentary, their thoughts on Emily Ratajkowski’s book, and updates on Jess’ celeb encounter! Then they chat first impressions, talking about how they believe they come off VS how people receive them, they cold call friends to get their IRL reactions to being asked about their first impressions of Bekah and Jess, come upon some positive realizations, discuss tips on complimenting lovers/friends, and more! 

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***KIWI CO: Get 50% off your first month plus FREE shipping on any crate line with code CHATTY at kiwico.com

***ROTHYS: New customers get $20 off your first purchase at rothys.com/chatty

***TALKSPACE: Visit talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month when you use promo code CHATTY at sign-up! 

***BYJU’s FUTURE SCHOOL: Go to byjus.com/podcast to sign up for your first class absolutely FREE! 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
